feed.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Emacs Lisp in GitHub

entry.title: rainstormstudio/nerd-icons-dired
entry.summary:
#+TITLE: nerd-icons-dired - Use nerd-icons for Dired #+AUTHOR: Hongyu Ding #+LANGUAGE: en

[[https://melpa.org/#/nerd-icons-dired][file:https://melpa.org/packages/nerd-icons-dired-badge.svg]]

nerd-icons-dired is inspired by [[https://github.com/jtbm37/all-the-icons-dired][all-the-icons-dired]]

[[file:screenshots/demo.png]]

  • Usage add nerd-icons-dired to the load-path #+BEGIN_SRC emacs-lisp (require 'nerd-icons) ... (require 'nerd-icons-dired) (add-hook 'dired-mode-hook #'nerd-icons-dired-mode) #+END_SRC or using use-package #+BEGIN_SRC emacs-lisp (use-package nerd-icons-dired :hook (dired-mode . nerd-icons-dired-mode)) #+END_SRC
